OOC: Sorry if I upset anybody, I was just joking with rAuq, as he always
corrects me when I use bad grammer, and I always tell him i'm in a hurry,
its kind of a running gag. I thought people could tell it was a joke
because of the "Club you and eat your bones" part. :P


As he continued Condor arrived at an Elevator. Overtop it said basement.

Wildrider walks by the prison with a energon cube in his hand, and takes a
sip out of it every once and a while. He liked not having to open his
mouth. "Hey Maximal, want some energon" he laughed out mockingly. "Whats a
matter, dont ya feel like talking" he kept on shouting as he neared the
cell. He wondered why the Maximal was deciding not to respond.
